main.title: Find Your Dream Career with a Smart Assistant
main.description: Tan'dau is an AI-powered career guidance platform that helps students choose the right profession, university, and skills based on their strengths and market trends‚Äîmaking career decisions simple and data-driven. üöÄ

main.feeling_lost_description1: is here to turn your uncertainty into confidence. Let our smart AI dive deep into your strengths, passions, and hidden potential - and guide you to a future where you thrive, not just survive.
main.feeling_lost_description2: Because you deserve more than ‚Äújust a job‚Äù. You deserve a path that inspires you every day.
